plot: Lisa joins a group of rich girls when she makes a friend who loves horses; Homer takes Marge on a romantic cruise.

Lisa befriends a girl named Addy who shares a love for horses. Lisa attends a sleepover, but it becomes a nightmare for her when Addy's so-called friends, Sloan, Bella Ella, and Tessa Rose start bullying Lisa relentlessly. Lisa decides to enlist Bart to help her get revenge on Addy and her friends. Lisa uses saddle polish to ruin the girl's braids as payback for their remorseless actions towards her. The next morning, Addy and the girl's hair gets ruined in the process. Lisa and Bart try to make their escape, but she notices Bart has a fear of horses and she helps her brother overcome his fear. However, Sloan, Bella Ella, and Tessa Rose try to take down Lisa and Bart. Addy realizes that her so-called friends have gone too far and she ends her friendship with them. Both Lisa and Addy agree to hang out again and they part ways. Meanwhile, Marge and Homer go to a cruise but it goes horribly wrong when Homer sends the music overboard. The attendants become angry at Homer, but Marge defends her husband's actions.
